entry.title: Roadtrip in America 2013
entry.content: In this year, I did several crazy road trips, each trip has about 3k miles. Here're them. # Winter Trip The first trip is a trip with my parents, where they flied to Chicago and I drove them to UIUC for a visit. We then flied to LA and rented a car to start our road trip. The whole trip was mainly in California, though we drove a bit east and visited Las Vegas and Grand canyon. # Route 66 I drove from Champaign all the way to Mountain View, with most of the part of [Route 66](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/U.S._Route_66). # I-80 After my internship in California, I drove back from Mountain View to Champaign.
